mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.classname, COUNT(s.id) AS student_count, c.created_at FROM class c LEFT JOIN student s ON c.id = s.class_id GROUP BY c.id, c.classname, c.created_at ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
SELECT classname from class where id = #{id}
SELECT count(*) from class where classname = #{classname}
